mapper.insert: insert into board(title, descripition, userNo, boardType, category, date) values(#{title}, #{descripition}, #{user_no}, #{board_type}, #{category}, now())
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, descripition=#{descripition}, boardType=#{board_type}, category=#{category}, date=now() where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.select: select TB.board_no, TB.board_type, TB.category, TB.title, TB.descripition, TB.user_no, TB.date, TM.name, TM.department, TM.position from Board TB left join User TM on TB.user_no = TM.membe_no where board_no = #{value}
